wallet.name: Bitcoin Core - bitcoind (no forward)
wallet.help: This variant of the wallet generates new addresses for each transaction and does not forward payments from temporary address

wallet.name: BitGo Wallet
wallet.help: Host should start with http:// or https://

wallet.name: BitGo Wallet (no forward)
wallet.help: This variant of the wallet generates new addresses for each transaction and does not forward payments from temporary address. Host should start with http:// or https://

wallet.name: Coinbase.com Wallet
wallet.help: accountname parameter is optional

wallet.name: Coinbase.com Wallet (no forward)
wallet.help: accountname parameter is optional. This variant of the wallet generates new addresses for each transaction and does not forward payments from temporary address

wallet.name: BitcoinABC/BitcoinClassic Cash Core - bitcoind
wallet.help: For BCH SELL this is the only supported wallet

wallet.name: BitcoinABC/BitcoinClassic Cash Core - bitcoind (no forward)
wallet.help: For BCH SELL this is the only supported wallet. This variant generates new addresses for each transaction and does not forward payments from temporary address

ratesource.name: Telr.io Rate Source
ratesource.help: Over 100+ crypto rates can be sourced directly from the Telr DeFi Network. Recommended for Telr Gatekeeper and Telr Cash operators.

wallet.name: Telr.io Cash Wallet (stable base coins)
wallet.help: Telr Cash is a non-custodial, stablecoin "hot" wallet with access to over 100+ cryptos.

wallet.name: Block.io Wallet
wallet.help: You can specify optional parameter priority to increase the network fee paid in the given transaction. Options are low, medium, high and will pay 1x, 2x, and 3x the minimum network fees possible on the network, respectively. If not specified, low will be used.

wallet.name: Block.io Wallet (no forward)
wallet.help: This variant of the wallet generates new addresses for each transaction and does not forward payments from temporary address. You can specify optional parameter priority to increase the network fee paid in the given transaction. Options are low, medium, high and will pay 1x, 2x, and 3x the minimum network fees possible on the network, respectively. If not specified, low will be used.

wallet.name: Litecoind (no forward)
wallet.help: This variant generates new addresses for each transaction and does not forward payments from temporary address

wallet.name: lnd
wallet.help: URL starts with https://, may contain a port number and must end with '/'. Macaroon and cert are hex encoded files admin.macaroon and tls.cert. Cert parameter is not mandatory if trusted authority signed cert is used.

wallet.name: Dash Core - dashd (no forward)
wallet.help: For DASH SELL this is the only supported wallet. This variant generates new addresses for each transaction and does not forward payments from temporary address

wallet.name: Sumcoind (no forward)
wallet.help: This variant generates new addresses for each transaction and does not forward payments from temporary address

wallet.name: infura.io wallet
wallet.help: Mnemonic should be 24 words delimited by spaces
